about.title: About Me
about.content: I am Lakshmipriya RajeshKanna, a software engineer with a Master’s from Drexel University. I specialize in full-stack web development, DevOps, and AI-powered systems. I am experienced in Python, Java, JavaScript, React, Spring Boot, SQL, and cloud platforms like AWS.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.content: I have a diverse skill set across frontend, backend, databases, DevOps, testing, design, and AI tools.

education.title: Education
education.content: I hold a Master of Science in Software Engineering from Drexel University (GPA: 3.72) and a Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology from Sona College of Technology, India (GPA: 3.8).

fun.title: Fun & Hobbies
fun.content: I love baking, especially cakes and cupcakes. Experimenting with new flavors and decorating treats is one of my favorite hobbies.

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.content: I have experience working across DevOps, software engineering, and full-stack development, contributing to both startups and established companies.

highlights: Containerized applications using Docker
Automated cloud infrastructure provisioning with Terraform
Implemented monitoring and logging with Grafana
Built multi-page Streamlit dashboards for Amazon analytics
Developed Neo4j referral system with BigQuery and GDS algorithms
Experimented with GraphRAG agent integrating structured and unstructured data with HuggingFace models
Engineered client portal for shipment tracking and invoicing with React, Node.js, PostgreSQL
Managed AWS deployments with Docker and CI/CD pipelines
Implemented JWT authentication and IAM control

projects.title: Projects
projects.content: I have worked on a range of projects spanning AI-powered e-commerce, game engines, blockchain tokens, mobile apps, and machine learning models.

items.name: Sonic Touch – AI Powered E-commerce
highlights: Deployed voice-enabled e-commerce platform, improving accessibility engagement by 85%
Integrated AI-powered assistant with Rasa for conversational interactions
Containerized full-stack application for cloud deployment

items.name: Dungeon Crawler Game Engine
highlights: Designed Java-based game with GUI, player movement, enemies, and power-ups
Applied TDD and XP practices achieving 95%+ unit test coverage
Automated CI/CD pipelines with GitLab ensuring reliable deployments

items.name: Chess Board Move Validation
highlights: Created a college project validating chess moves within a 10-day deadline
Reduced bug occurrence by 20% through rigorous quality assurance practices (TDD)
Achieved 94% accuracy rate through robust software testing protocols

items.name: Face Mask Detection
highlights: Prepared and preprocessed dataset for high-quality training
Trained ResNet50 for mask detection and performed face verification using cosine similarity

items.name: Ethereum Token Development
highlights: Created custom ERC-20 token reducing gas fees by 40%
Integrated MetaMask for seamless user transactions with 99% success rate
Managed weekly sprints using Kanban for independent workflow execution

items.name: What Should I Eat?
highlights: Developed a full-stack meal recommendation app using the Edamam API, increasing user engagement by 40%
Implemented secure login with Google OAuth and OTP verification, raising adoption rate by 25%
Optimized backend performance with caching and load balancing, reducing response time by 30%

items.name: Car Parking System
highlights: Built native Android app with MVVM architecture for parking reservations, improving modularity by 40%
Integrated Google Maps API for real-time location views, boosting user interaction by 60%
Implemented live booking and slot management backend in PHP, enhancing reliability by 35%

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: You can reach me directly via email or phone, and explore my work on LinkedIn and GitHub.
